analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0xb2458f815aa3d0279f2bc456b7db95b13dfa5ed4.sol:
	Contract ONEPAY has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0xb2458f815aa3d0279f2bc456b7db95b13dfa5ed4.sol#225)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0xb2458f815aa3d0279f2bc456b7db95b13dfa5ed4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/10/0xb2458f815aa3d0279f2bc456b7db95b13dfa5ed4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/10/0xb2458f815aa3d0279f2bc456b7db95b13dfa5ed4.sol#93) is not in mixedCase
